#include<iostream>
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ll t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
      cin>>n;
      ll maxi=0,mini=0,i,x;
      for(i=0;i<n;i++)
      {
          cin>>x;
          if(i==0)
            mini=x;
          else
          {
              if(x<mini)
                mini=x;
          }
          if(x>maxi)
            maxi=x;
      }
      if(maxi-mini>1)
        cout<<"BAD\n";
      else
        cout<<"GOOD\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
